```{r , echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
rawdat <- read_xlsx("schedule_315.xlsx", sheet='topic_overview')
```
  
```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
out <- rawdat %>% select(Week:`Data Camp`)
testrows <- grep("midterm|final", out$Topic, ignore.case=TRUE)

knitr::kable(out, align="clccccc", escape=FALSE) %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "striped", "responsive", "bordered")) %>% 
  row_spec(testrows, background = "BurlyWood")
```
